de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.adapter.connection

Class ImcConnectionAdapterIetf

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.adapter.connection.ImcConnectionAdapterIetf
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImcConnectionAdapter, ImConnectionAdapter

     class ImcConnectionAdapterIetf
extends Object
implements ImcConnectionAdapter
    Connection adapter for a IMC connection according to IETF/TCG specifications.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ImWriter<ImMessage> byteWriter 
      private org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.IMCConnection connection

      ImcConnectionAdapterIetf(ImWriter<? extends ImMessage> byteWriter, org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.IMCConnection connection)
      Creates a connection adapter with the given message writer for the specified IMC connection.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private List<PaAttribute> filterTypes(List<? extends ImAttribute> imAttributes)
      Removes any message attribute, which is not of type PaAttribute, because only these type can be send thru a IETF compatible connection.

        long type,

           throws org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.TNCException
        Sends the message for an integrity measurement component to the adapted connection.
        Parameters:
        flags - the message flags as composed byte
        vendorId - the vendor ID describing the component
        type - the type ID describing the component
        collectorId - the referred IMC
        validatorId - the referred IMV
        message - the raw message
        Throws:
        org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.TNCException - if the message cannot be send

      • filterTypes

        private List<PaAttribute> filterTypes(List<? extends ImAttribute> imAttributes)
        Removes any message attribute, which is not of type PaAttribute, because only these type can be send thru a IETF compatible connection.

        Returns:
